projectName: Defi App X Dashboard - Comprehensive UI/UX Overhaul
description: Complete UI/UX audit resolving duplicate components, inconsistent styling, and branding issues

brandGuidelines.name: Defi App
brandGuidelines.tagline: X Strategy Dashboard for CT Domination
brandGuidelines.note: Always use 'Defi App' (capital D, lowercase efi) - this is a proper noun

criticalIssues.description: Two competing sidebar components create double navigation on the left side
criticalIssues.rootCause: layout.tsx imports old Sidebar while page.tsx uses AppLayout with its own sidebar
criticalIssues.resolution: Remove old Sidebar and Header from root layout, use only AppLayout

criticalIssues.description: Mix of zinc color scale and premium design tokens
criticalIssues.rootCause: Legacy components use bg-zinc-*, newer use bg-base/surface/elevated
criticalIssues.resolution: Standardize on premium design token system

criticalIssues.description: 'DeFi App' appears with inconsistent capitalization across 40+ files

executionPlan.name: Remove Duplicate Layout Components
tasks: Update layout.tsx to remove old Sidebar and Header imports
Simplify layout.tsx to only wrap with Providers
Ensure AppLayout is the single source of layout structure
Delete or deprecate unused sidebar.tsx and header.tsx

executionPlan.name: Global Branding Fix
tasks: Replace all 'DeFi App X' with 'Defi App'
Update page titles and meta descriptions

executionPlan.name: Gradient Standardization
tasks: Standardize logo gradient to violet-500 -> indigo-600

successCriteria: Single sidebar visible on left side
No zinc-* colors in active components
